content.rendered:
Your Seats at the Staples Center

Los Angeles’ popular Staples Center is home to the NBA’s Lakers and Clippers, the NHL’s Kings, and the WNBA’s Sparks. While the arena sees plenty of action from its home teams, it has a long and impressive resume that includes two previous NBA All-Star games, two NHL All-Star games and concerts from pretty much every major music artist of recent years. The Staples Center is also home to the annual Grammy Awards. The arena sees 4 million visitors annually and has had a huge part in revitalizing L.A.’s downtown core since it opened in 1999.

Standard Package Seating Categories

Upper Level End /Corner
305-314 / 330-331

Upper Level Side
301-304 / 315-321 / 332-334

200 Level End
205-210 / 214-219

Lower Level Side/Corner
103-104 / 108-109 / 113-114 / 117-118
